title: Role Model
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Everyone says that you’re very mature, Dia. What’s your secret? Do you have someone you look up to?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>They’re just exaggerating. I’m just an ordinary person.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Really...? You’re not keeping secrets from Lanzhu, are you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Of course not... Well, I do have a role model.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>So there is someone! What kind of person are they?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Hm... I’d say they’re very intelligent, proud, and hardworking. They’re also unique and very friendly.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Are they a historical figure?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Hmhm. I’d say they’re historical to me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Huh, what’s that supposed to mean!? Come on, tell me already!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Why don’t you try and take a guess, Lanzhu-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
